name: Zzzz-Zzzz-Zzzz
description: When you sleep, you are dreaming. Some dreams are beautiful and vivid, the others are strange, and the rest of them are horrible... We've having them all the night, and then wake up and forget them. But what if one day your "awakening" would be a difficult task? Could you find a way out of the dreams and wake up?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 or later Storage: 100 MB available space
